channel.title: [PI] Saving all files?
channel.description:
I'm new to coding and decided to learn using a PI base.
My problem is, when I close the batch file to restart the server, nobodies accounts save.
So I'm assuming I either need a "saveall" type command, or I need to make the accounts automatically save every now and then.
Can anyone who knows what they're doing help me out?

item.title: [PI] Saving all files?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

::update seconds

Would send all users ‘System update in: countdown.’ Then when it gets to zero players are disconnected. All you have to do is re-open the servers command prompt.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Saving all files?
item.dc:creator: @nickenator nickenator
item.description:
@nickenator wrote:

Alright, thanks. I wasn’t aware of that command :s

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Saving all files?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

There’s an ‘::update’ command for a reason, use it.

Read full topic
